long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to help you succeed in answering tutorials and learning. This is a paid extension, you can update your payment using the Pay Now button.

The extension is best suited to learn MCQ type of questions. The extension explains the answer as well. Code completion is available too, although does not work as good as MCQ.
